  • Constructor Details

    • Vehicle

      public Vehicle​(java.lang.String maker, java.lang.String model) throws VehicleException
      Constructor for abstract vehicle class, sets up attributes accordingly
      Parameters:
      maker - String of maker
      model - String of model
      Throws:
      VehicleException - when conditions are not satisfied for maker and model

  • Method Details

    • addBidBuyer

      public void addBidBuyer​(Buyer newBuyer, double price, java.lang.String date)
      A main method I will be using to add Buyer and Bid object to HashMap
      Parameters:
      newBuyer - Buyer object to be added to the BidManager
      price - Price of the bid, double
      date - Date of the bid, in specified dd/mm/yyyy format

    • removeBidBuyer

      public void removeBidBuyer​(int buyerId)
      It takes in Buyer ID and removes the Bid from the HashMap in BidsManager
      Parameters:
      buyerId - Buyer ID of the Buyer object to remove, in Integer

    • getBidNum

      public int getBidNum()
      Accessor for the size of BidManager
      Returns:
      Integer, number of bids stored

    • getBid

      public Bid getBid​(int key)
      Obtains Bid object from Buyer ID as key
      Parameters:
      key - Integer representing Buyer ID
      Returns:
      Bid object corresponding to the key

    • setMaker

      public boolean setMaker​(java.lang.String maker)
      Setter for maker that returns true when completed successfully
      Parameters:
      maker - A string containing the maker of the vehicle
      Returns:
      true if maker is inside the character range, false otherwise

    • setModel

      public boolean setModel​(java.lang.String model)
      Setter for model that returns true when completed successfully
      Parameters:
      model - A string showing the model of the vehicle
      Returns:
      true if model is inside the character range, false otherwise

    • getvId

      public int getvId()
      getter for vehicle ID
      Returns:
      the integer ID of the vehicle

    • nextID

      public int nextID()
      A helper code from instruction sheet, that generates random integer of digit 5
      Returns:
      an integer of 5 digit, randomly generated to be assigned accordingly

    • description

      public java.lang.String description()
      This helps getting the characteristics of the vehicle
      Returns:
      string showing the main description of the vehicle as a text
